member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_RANGE
member.summary: Represents the minimum and maximum range of the possible values for a font axis. If minValue equals maxValue, then the axis is static rather than variable.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_RANGE.axisTag
member.summary: The four-character identifier of the font axis (for example, weight, width, slant, italic, and so on).

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_RANGE.minValue
member.summary: The minimum value supported by this axis.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_RANGE.maxValue
member.summary: The maximum value supported by this axis.
